General.Name: Tropical Canning (Thailand) Public Company Limited
General.Description: Tropical Canning (Thailand) Public Company Limited engages in the production and export of canned and pouched seafood products in Thailand, Australia, the United States, Canada, the Middle East, South Africa, and Asia. It offers canned tuna and shellfish products; ready-to-eat processed products, including sardines and Mackerel in Tomato Sauce; ready-to-eat processed tuna and salmon; and canned pet food, which include pet food from raw sardines, tuna, and amimal offal. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Hat Yai, Thailand.
General.Address: 63 Constitution Drive, Chico, CA, United States, 95973
